edu.nyu.cs.cs101.consumers

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.nyu.cs.cs101.consumers.GeometricObject
      • edu.nyu.cs.cs101.consumers.Ball
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Colorable, Drawable, Movable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExpandableBall

    public class Ball
extends GeometricObject
implements Colorable
    The Ball class is based on a generic GeometricObject and has agreed to implement the Colorable and Drawable interfaces so that code using the Ball class can check if it's an instance of those interfaces and be sure that those methods are defined. TODO: I have implemented the Drawable methods for you. Your job is to implement the Colorable methods. TODO: Implement any abstract methods from the base class (GeometricObject)
    Author:
    YOUR_AUTHOR_TAG_HERE
